backend/main.mo: Defines core domain types, maps, and access-controlled query functions for managing benches, documents, components, users, and storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend query file to a specific requirement with metadata and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, protected routes, theme provider, and renders the main application shell.
Empty placeholder file for an admin access gate component.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a recovery UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Ensures backend actor availability before rendering protected content with loading and error fallback.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Blocks access until user authentication loads and shows an error when not signed in.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Generic draggable list component enabling item reordering via drag-and-drop.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Hook managing drag-and-drop item order state with handlers for drag start, over, and end.
Main layout component providing navigation, theme toggle, logout, and routing outlet with mobile and desktop nav bars.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows buttons to scroll to top or bottom based on scroll position and handles smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Single-value entity tag input with add/remove logic, suggestion filtering, and popover-based selection.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Grid-based selector for predefined avatar images using provided avatar IDs and labels.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar from predefined or custom images with size options and cache-busting support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
Zustand store that tracks a timestamp value to force reloads of cached avatar images.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the user's preferred dashboard chart type in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context for Internet Identity, managing login, logout, identity loading, and status.
Periodically calls the backend to update the user's last-seen timestamp when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating test benches, user profiles, roles, and expiration settings via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Empty placeholder for the admin page component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Empty placeholder for the admin benches panel component.
Empty placeholder for the admin documents panel component.
Empty placeholder for the admin users panel component.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Displays detailed information for a single test bench with editing, component management, history, and deletion features.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Lists all test benches with search, filtering, and a modal for creating new benches.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal for creating a new test bench with fields for metadata, photo upload, tags, documents, and component duplication.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Provides a table UI to add, edit, remove, and duplicate bench components with validation and expiration status handling.
Manages document uploads, versioning, association, and deletion for a bench across predefined categories.
Displays a chronological list of bench history entries with user info and timestamps.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallback handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Allows selecting document categories and attaching files with version fields for each category.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog to copy a component to multiple other benches with selection controls and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal form to edit bench metadata, tags, and photo with validation and update submission.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Interactive tag input allowing adding, removing, and selecting suggested tags with filtering and popover UI.
Placeholder page outlining planned features for creating a new test bench.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Computes component expiration statuses and renders a pie chart summarizing OK, expiring soon, and expired counts.
Counts components by status with optional bench filtering and displays the results in a bar chart.
Buckets components by expiration time ranges, supporting multiple time windows and bench filtering, and displays the data in a bar chart.
Aggregates documents by category and shows their distribution in a pie chart.
Groups components by expiration month and displays the last 12 months as a bar or line chart.
Calculates expired component counts per bench and visualizes the top benches in a bar or line chart.
Displays overall component health percentages and totals using progress bars, handling empty data gracefully.
Renders draggable dashboard statistic and chart cards with persisted ordering via localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page fetching benches, components, documents, and profile data to compute statuses and render multiple dashboard sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page allowing editing user info, expiration settings, and avatar selection with backend sync.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Simple sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with error handling and a styled login card.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Maps avatar IDs to image paths and provides helpers to retrieve paths and available IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Loads and converts a default bench placeholder image into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads a document by converting an ExternalBlob to a browser‑triggered file download.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Utilities for reading, saving, and computing expiration thresholds and component expiration status.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates simple unique IDs using timestamps and random strings.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Cleans and normalizes text by fixing whitespace, capitalizing sentences, adding punctuation, and uppercasing known abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Filters benches by matching all search terms against combined bench fields and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted parameters for routing.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Contains validation utilities for emails, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, and custom animations for the frontend.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-related build files, specifying module resolution and included vite config.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup with React, environment variable plugins, path aliasing, dev server proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requests related to fixing equipment duplication visibility in the destination bench Health Book.
